title: ASCII Sphere
htmlContent:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>ASCII Sphere</title>
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/p5@1.6.0/lib/p5.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
<script>
let points = [];

function setup() {
  createCanvas(400, 400, WEBGL);
  camera(0, 0, -100, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);

  for (let i = 0; i < 500; i++) {
    let theta = random(TWO_PI);
    let phi = random(PI);
    let x = sin(phi) * cos(theta);
    let y = sin(phi) * sin(theta);
    let z = cos(phi);
    points.push({x: x * 30, y: y * 30, z: z * 30});
  }
}

function draw() {
  background(0);
  let angle = frameCount * 0.01;

  for (let point of points) {
    let rotatedX = point.x * cos(angle) - point.z * sin(angle);
    let rotatedZ = point.x * sin(angle) + point.z * cos(angle);
    let brightness = map(rotatedZ, -30, 30, 255, 0);

    fill(brightness);
    push();
    translate(rotatedX, point.y, rotatedZ);
    textSize(10);
    textAlign(CENTER, CENTER);
    text('5', 0, 0);
    pop();
  }
}
</script>
</body>
</html>

metadata.description: An interactive web application featuring webgl, shaders, astronomy.
